text: andreas, didnt you write some architecture slides / diagrams?

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
here is a diagram:
http://wiki.apache.org/cocoon-lenya-data/attachments/NewPublicationHowTo/attachments/lenya-setup.pdf

When I find the time, I'll browse my slides. Thorsten volunteered to summarize
my talk in Madrid, I'll remind him on the dev list.

The world will hate me but the live diagram shows the same mini picture of the
default publication as authoring (i.e. it does not show the default publication
as it appears in the live area)

Such a minor point but ...
